level.heading: Notice requirement.
level.text: Within 30 days of [April 4, 2003], the Mayor shall issue an administrative order advising all District agency heads, deputy agency heads, chief financial officers, agency budget directors, agency controllers, and other managers of the requirement of this subchapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-285, see notes following ยง 47-355.01.
For Law 15-105, see notes following ยง 47-340.22.
